abstract: Nepalese police recover bodies of 21 people killed in spring 2015 landslide along major trekking route.
lead_paragraph: The recovery had been hampered by a wall of ice and rock that flattened the village of Langtang after a devastating earthquake struck.

headline.main: Nepal Recovers Bodies of 21 People Buried in April Landslide
headline.print_headline: Asia; Nepal: Bodies Are Recovered From April Landslide

snippet: The recovery had been hampered by a wall of ice and rock that flattened the village of Langtang after a devastating earthquake struck.
